price: 186. „Tu esi tik žmogus, kaip ir mes, ir tikrai mes manome, kad esi tu vienas iš melagių.“
arabic: وَمَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُنَا وَإِن نَّظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā anta illā basharun mith'lunā wa-in naẓunnuka lamina al-kādhibīna
